contains(char) - Method in class Number.Base.Converter.Base

Convert a given number to this base.
ConvertToCustomBase(String, Base, Base) - Static method in class Number.Base.Converter.Converter
Converts the given numberin the form of String (can be any base), for the base given in the base parameter.
convertToDecimal(String, Base) - Static method in class Number.Base.Converter.Converter
Converts the given number, to the decimal base.
correspondingValueInDecimal(char) - Method in class Number.Base.Converter.Base
Returns the corresponding value of this symbol in base 10.
correspondingValueInThisBase(int) - Method in class Number.Base.Converter.Base
Returns the value corresponding to this base symbol.
